TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_balidas, title = balidas, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/balidas} }

S.FORM: lalangawan nida (sakauzip a mulangaway) madihinay nu kilang a walu a lasubu a lidek nu buyu'. 800 . sapihicahi:ca sakacacay; kapah satangsuyan atu sasaasik atu sapacengceng sapibuting ku banuh. . sakatusa; mangaduway a liuc sapisanga' tu saasik. . sakauulu; asu' ka'nen tu dungec nu balidas. .
